about_the_game:
In Trading Towns, your goal is to find ways to make your town wealthy and prosperous.
Collect resources, sell or refine them to make more profit, hire adventurers and let them fight monsters or search for treasures, build many different buildings, use artefacts and simple find the best way to make money.

Features


  • Relaxing: Build and manage your town with simple and relaxing mechanics. This game was designed to be played while actually doing something else.
  • Needs: Fulfill the needs of your population to earn more gold. Construct public buildings like schools, hospitals or temples or fulfill the needs with items instead. It's up to you how you do it, find the best strategy.
  • Items: Discover different items and their uses. Combine up to 3 items in different buildings to produce a new item. Some can be used by your adventurers or fulfill the needs of your population.
  • Adventurers: Hire adventurers and let them fight monsters, collect resources or find treasures. Adventurers grow and become stronger and more efficient in their tasks. They also have their own strengths, weaknesses and unique abilities.
  • Artifacts and Spells: These can be found with your adventurers and give your town unique advantages such as higher gold income or more specific resources.
  • Mayors: Select a mayor that suits your strategy. Each has their own unique abilities like increasing the building limit or providing additional storage space.
